xtc.lang.blink

Class NativeCDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtc.lang.blink.NativeCDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgentNativeDeclaration, NativeDebugger

    public class NativeCDB
extends Object
implements NativeDebugger, AgentNativeDeclaration
    Microsoft CDB driver as a native component debugger.
